channel.description:
[center][SIZE=4]Welcome To The New Era, An Economic Skills/Pk Based Server ![/SIZE][/center]
Check out our forums : [url=http://the-newera.forumotion.com/forum]Free forum : The New Era[/url]
Client Download : [URL=http://up.ht/WeO384]The New Era.jar - 381 KB[/URL]
________________
[b]The New Era Staff [/b]
Owner : Mod Era
Admin : Spot Open
Moderators : Spot Open , Spot Open , Spot Open
[B][U]Our Main Focuses[/U][/B] The New Era main focus is to have one of the most stablized economy ! A diverse and balanced economy is what makes a server much better and makes it funner that is how I see it .
Pking & Skilling are also 1 of our focuses because that is what makes up the server without it there isn't The New Era !
[B][U]Features[/U][/B] All Working Skills. Stable Economy. Working Turmoil. Overloads. Working Dragon Claw Special. Dicing. Custom Skilling Area. Full Working Barrows. Custom Points. Corporeal Beast 24/7 And much much much more !
Join now , Mod Era
